mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plans ( USER_IDX, TITLE, IS_AI, DELETE_YN, CREATE_AT ) VALUES ( #{userIdx}, #{title}, 1, 'N', NOW() )
INSERT INTO plan_detail ( PLAN_IDX, PLAN_TITLE, VISIT_ORDER, TYPES, VISIT_TIME, ADDRESS ) VALUES ( #{planIdx}, #{detail.title}, #{detail.day}, #{detail.category}, #{detail.time}, #{detail.address} )
mapper.select: SELECT IDX AS planIdx, TITLE AS title, CREATE_AT AS createAt FROM plans WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx} ORDER BY CREATE_AT DESC
SELECT VISIT_ORDER AS day, VISIT_TIME AS time, PLAN_TITLE AS title, ADDRESS AS address, TYPES AS category FROM plan_detail WHERE PLAN_IDX = #{planIdx} ORDER BY VISIT_ORDER ASC, VISIT_TIME ASC
SELECT IDX AS planIdx, TITLE AS title, CREATE_AT AS createAt FROM plans WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx} AND (DELETE_YN = 'N' OR DELETE_YN IS NULL) ORDER BY CREATE_AT DESC
